name: Warm Intentions
description:
An abstract digital painting + digital collage created with warm intent. Below is a poem inspired by the artwork & various life circumstances. I create from the heart, always in all my various forms of media. I hope it shows more & more as time goes on.

You approached me
with warm intentions
yet somehow over time
they went cold,
now we're frozen over.
Where did you leave them?
Can we find them again?
That warm intent of yours,
where did you leave it?
It's all I wanted love,
it's all I ever wanted.
